net.sitecore.android.sdk.api.provider

Class SelectionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sitecore.android.sdk.api.provider.SelectionBuilder

  • public class SelectionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for building selection clauses for SQLiteDatabase. Each appended clause is combined using AND. This class is not thread safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectionBuilder()

      • reset

      • where

        public SelectionBuilder where(java.lang.String selection,
                     java.lang.String... selectionArgs)
        Append the given selection clause to the internal state. Each clause is surrounded with parenthesis and combined using AND.
